From the navel wheel, it turns to the heart and abides there.
This letter is yellow in color and is the fundamental heart letter of Bodhisattva Prajnaparamita.
Having visualized this,
further visualize this letter transforming into Bodhisattva Prajnaparamita.

blue lotus flowers,

Visualize in this way according to the Dharma. Having visualized this,
